name: Tiny Goalie
description:
Tiny Striker: World Football available NOW: http://m.onelink.me/1df54446

Tiny Sports games now have over 2 MILLION downloads!! <3

Dive your goalie to save oncoming soccer balls and avoid flying water bottles.

"An addictive goalkeeping challenge" PocketGamer

"Tiny Goalie an app-solute must-play for Flappy fans" GamerThumb

"Fun to play almost any time of the day - 4.5/5 Stars" 148Apps

"Game of the Month February" Game Salad

HOW TO PLAY
------------
- Slide your finger to move your tiny goalie and save soccer balls
- Avoid flying red water bottles!
- Collect multiplier badges to boost your score!
- Earn 4 medals: Bronze, Silver, Gold (hard), Platinum (very hard)
- Challenge your friends and family on Game Center
- Share your highest scores on Twitter

** Thanks for making Tiny Goalie the number 1 sports game in Italy! **

Look out for our other FREE Tiny Sports titles: Tiny Striker, Tiny Tennis and Tiny Touchdown.

Check out our bubblicious new game Bubble Heroes http://bit.ly/bubbleheroes
